Savasi Island Experience the ultimate island retreat at Savasi Island Resort, located just 10 minutes from Savusavu airport on Vanua Levu. This secluded paradise is set on a private 52 acre island, with pristine coral reefs, abundant with sea life waiting to be explored, giant Banyan trees to inspire, private beaches to call your own, panoramic views to gaze upon, and awesome walking paths through coral ravines. Savasi is the perfect getaway for a blissful vacation, wedding or honeymoon, where authentic Fijian hospitality, in a truly unique and pristine environment, rejuvenates the mind, body and spirit.
